definition.name: App Service Web App Build Action
definition.description: Build an Azure Web App on Linux using the Oryx build system.

inputs.name: source-directory
inputs.description: Relative path (within the repository) to the source directory of the project you want to build; if no value is provided for this, the root of the repository ("GITHUB_WORKSPACE" environment variable) will be built.

inputs.name: platform
inputs.description: Programming platform used to build the web app; if no value is provided, Oryx will determine the platform to build with. The supported values are "dotnet", "nodejs", "php" and "python".

inputs.name: platform-version
inputs.description: Version of the programming platform used to build the web app; if no value is provided, Oryx will determine the version needed to build the repository.

evidence.reasoning: This action is primarily focused on building an Azure Web App, which falls under the Build category, and it also involves deploying the built application to Azure, thus fitting into the Deployment category as well.
